entry.title: Work proceeding on the Cloud Plugfest web site
entry.content:
In addition to the repository and Redmine-based tools supported here, work continues on the Cloud Plugfest central web site at http://cloudplugfest.org

At present this site is limited to project staff and administrators, but will be released to public view before the next Cloud Plugfest event in June 2012.

Stay tuned for further updates!
